ingredients.content: 17 ½ oz yellow peaches peeled, quartered and frozen (see Tip)

preparations.content: Place sugar into mixing bowl and grind <b>15 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add peaches and mix <b>15 sec/speed 8<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add yogurt and mix <b>50 sec/speed 5<b>. Serve immediately
